datasets.name: cluster_to_cluster_annotation_membership_pivoted
datasets.description: This dataset provides detailed annotations for 5,322 cell clusters, classifying them based on neurotransmitter type, class, subclass, and supertype. It includes neurotransmitter types such as Glutamate, GABA, and Dopamine. Such classifications are pivotal for understanding the functional roles of different neuronal populations in the brain.

raw.name: cluster_alias
raw.description: Identifier for the cluster, used to group cells with similar properties for further analysis.

raw.name: neurotransmitter
raw.description: Type of neurotransmitter associated with the cluster, indicating the chemical messenger used for neuron-to-neuron communication.

raw.name: class
raw.description: Class of the cluster, representing a broad categorization of cell types, such as excitatory or inhibitory neurons.

raw.name: subclass
raw.description: Subclass of the cluster, providing a more detailed categorization within the class, reflecting finer distinctions in cell type.

raw.name: supertype
raw.description: Supertype of the cluster, encompassing multiple subclasses, offering a higher-level view of cell type classification.

raw.name: cluster
raw.description: Specific cluster identifier, used in analysis to group and compare similar cells.

queries.question: List unique supertypes for the filtered class '19 MB Glut' and comment on generated insights.
